title: Full day tour sandboarding in Huacachina from Lima
description:
This is a very complete tour that departs the city of Lima on a tour of the most beautiful and deserted beaches of the Pacific Ocean and the oasis of Huacachina. to continue the journey to the wineries of ¬´El Catador¬ª that since 1856 maintains the production of wines and pisco in Ica, where we can learn more about the history of the national drink of Peru, and try their different varieties, you can have lunch in this place, a few minutes later we will finally reach the most important point of our adventure.

Huacachina is the world capital of sandboarding, the vast expanse of dunes in this part of Peru, makes this place a mandatory stop for its landscapes that for a moment you will think you are in the African Sahara desert, after some free time in the oasis and take pictures, people who decide to do professional sandboarding (snowboarding) or Sandski will test the equipment beforehand.
all_descriptions:
This is a very complete tour that departs the city of Lima on a tour of the most beautiful and deserted beaches of the Pacific Ocean and the oasis of Huacachina. to continue the journey to the wineries of ¬´El Catador¬ª that since 1856 maintains the production of wines and pisco in Ica, where we can learn more about the history of the national drink of Peru, and try their different varieties, you can have lunch in this place, a few minutes later we will finally reach the most important point of our adventure.

Huacachina is the world capital of sandboarding, the vast expanse of dunes in this part of Peru, makes this place a mandatory stop for its landscapes that for a moment you will think you are in the African Sahara desert, after some free time in the oasis and take pictures, people who decide to do professional sandboarding (snowboarding) or Sandski will test the equipment beforehand.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:El Catador Bodega Turistica, Fundo Tres Esquinas 102, Ica 11000 PeruTake a tour and taste the Pisco & wines of the area at this winery & Distillery, which also has a Very Old Lagar to stomp the grapes,a very old Falca for Pisco Distillation (150 Years Old ) Traditional Restaurant and Tasting Room with a Cave full of WineDuration: 1 hourStop At:Huacachina 11000, PeruHuacachina is a desert oasis in Southern Peru, located approximately 4 hours south of Lima. It is located just 10 minutes away from downtown Ica, a small city on the coast. It is a small lagoon surrounded by palm trees and gigantic sand dunes, similar to those seen in the Sahara Desert in Africa.Duration: 2 hours

Unforgettable sandboarding experience in Huacachina

Jul 2025 ‚Ä¢ Couples
What an amazing day we have in Huacachina. We started the experience going to the dunes in buggy ride, then we tried going down on the board. What an incredible experience full of adrenaline. Thanks to Rafa, he is an awesome teacher, super friendly that makes us being confident. Fully recommended experience for any person.

Sand boarding was sick

Apr 2025 ‚Ä¢ Friends
Experience with Alfonso was very professional yet personable and friendly. Was able to learn more Spanish and practice my Spanish with Alfonso as well. He was able to answer all of our questions and keep us informed about where we were traveling and the times we‚Äôd be leaving and arriving. The sandboarding experience itself was very cool and very scenic. As an experienced snowboarder it was a little easier for me but still a different feel that was challenging yet enjoyable. Would recommend Alfonso‚Äôs services and this experience to anyone!
